mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice( notice_id, reg_userid, solution_code, title, content, reg_date )VALUES( #{notice_id}, #{reg_userid}, #{solution_code}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT tn.notice_id , (select count(*) from tb_file tf2 where tf2.post_id = tn.notice_id ) as file_count, (select user_name from tb_user tu where tu.user_id = tn.reg_userid ) as user_name , tn.reg_date , tn.reg_userid , tn.solution_code , tn.title , tn.hit , tn."content" from tb_notice tn where 1=1

SELECT tn.notice_id , (select count(*) from tb_file tf2 where tf2.post_id = tn.notice_id ) as file_count, (select user_name from tb_user tu where tu.user_id = tn.reg_userid ) as user_name , tn.reg_date , tn.reg_userid , tn.solution_code , tn.title , tn.hit , tn."content" from tb_notice tn where 1=1
and tn.title like '%'||#{search_title}||'%'
order by tn.reg_date asc
order by tn.hit desc
order by tn.reg_date asc

SELECT tn.notice_id , (select count(*) from tb_file tf2 where tf2.post_id = tn.notice_id ) as file_count, tn.reg_userid , tn.reg_date , tn.solution_code , tn.title , tn.hit , tn."content" FROM tb_notice tn where notice_id = #{notice_id}
